imdb.title: Kyôgoku Natsuhiko kôsetsu hyakumonogatari
imdb.plot: A young aspiring writer sets out on a cross country journey to collect 100 tales of the supernatural. On the way he meets some very strange characters, and learns about much more than folktales.

episodes.title: Azuki Bean Washer
episodes.plot: In the midst of a torrential downpour, talisman vendor, Mataichi saves young Yamaoka Momosuke's life. Attracted by Mataichi's strange appearance, Momosuke searches after him in the dark rain.

episodes.title: Willow Woman
episodes.plot: Momosuke returns home to Ikomaya, but cannot forget the supernatural rescuer, Mataichi, and his otherworldly group.

episodes.title: Enchanted White Fox
episodes.plot: Momosuke returns to Mataichi and is lured into a dark and mysterious mountain with the promise of uncovering a compilation of ghost stories for his new literary work.

episodes.title: Dancing Head
episodes.plot: While separated from Mataichi, Momosuke encounters an alluring temptress named Oyoshi. But Momosuke soon discovers Oyoshi's father, Matajuro, harbors an unnatural desire for her.

episodes.title: Salty Choji
episodes.plot: Momosuke stares death in the face, but manages to survive and find his way to Chojiro Shioya's mansion. Chojiro's staff slowly nurses Momosuke back to health, but he soon realizes his memories of the previous days has magically disappeared.

episodes.title: Shibaemon the Racoon Dog
episodes.plot: On their travels, Momosuke and Mataichi randomly join a puppet theater troupe. Momosuke is forced to investigate when they realize a series of street killings seem to be following the troupe.

episodes.title: Katabira Crossroads
episodes.plot: In an attempt to uncover the reasons behind the strange happenings on Katabiraga Street, Momosuke travels to Kyoto to gather intelligence from Mr. Fushimiya.

episodes.title: Field Gun
episodes.plot: Momosuke is abruptly summoned back to Edo by his older brother, Gunhachiro Yamaoka, and is immediately shaken upon his arrival when he learns a bizarre event has taken place.

episodes.title: The Unkillable
episodes.plot: After being executed for the third time, we learn Giemon from Inarizaka is not what he seems.

episodes.title: Flames of Desire
episodes.plot: Momosuke is petitioned to help a Nagoya shipping mogul find his bride who mysteriously disappeared on their wedding night.

episodes.title: Marine Spirits
episodes.plot: After letting Shiragiku escape in Nagoya, Momosuke is unable to find his companion Mataichi. When he gets a tip from Kyogoku Tavern, Momosuke races to Sanuki to track down the elusive Mataichi and his supernatural band of characters.

episodes.title: The Death Spirits of Seven Man Point: Part 1
episodes.plot: After Momosuke encounters a "Ship Ghost" and is left in dispair, his lament only increases when a former member of the Kitabayashi clan explains the curse of the "Cape of Seven."

episodes.title: The Death Spirits of Seven Man Point: Part 2
episodes.plot: Momosuke tracks down Mataichi in a town of tragedy finally tracks down Mataichi in the town under Kitabayshi Castle's domain. When tragedy strikes the town, how will Momosuke deal with the disaster?
